backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining types and state for products, vendors, orders, users, and authorization, with helpers for admin/vendor checks and profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing restored frontend build configs, Vite env shims, deployment verification steps, and associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each major frontend page and component, focused on admin, vendor, customer flows, UI styling, and feature behavior.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining production build fixes, added Vite/TypeScript configs, process.env shim, required env vars, and build/deploy steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app root with PWA metadata and manifest links.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest configuring app name, theme colors, start URL, display mode, and icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker that precaches assets, cleans old caches, and handles fetch with network-first for HTML and cache-first for static assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main React app routes using TanStack Router, including customer, vendor, and admin pages with role-based protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: Error boundary for admin pages that logs diagnostics and shows a fallback UI when crashes occur.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminNav.t: Admin navigation tabs linking to control panel, vendors, orders, and products.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: App layout wrapper providing top navigation, bottom navigation, and main content area with gradient background.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message with optional admin tools and backend error diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBypass: Wrapper that requires authentication for admin routes and redirects unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter profile details and save them to the backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access gate that enforces admin, vendor, or customer permissions with detailed admin state handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/SafeAdminGa: Empty placeholder file intended for an admin access guard component.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar that switches links based on user role and displays cart badges and active states.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Styled button component applying a primary gradient CTA appearance.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a product deal card with image, pricing, discount, and optional deal ribbon linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: React floating label input wrapper using custom Input and Label with peer-based animations.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Auto-rotating hero banner slider with manual navigation arrows and slide indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive product grid with loading skeletons, pricing, stock badges, and add-to-cart support.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Renders a Badge styled based on order status using helper functions.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with search, logo, cart count, role-based actions, and responsive layout.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Defines VendorData interface and a static list of sample vendor entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via React Query, updating on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Reads actor query state from React Query cache using a lightweight external store subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, and related backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with a detailed light/dark color system and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page component showcasing mission, features, and service highlights with styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing navigation cards for vendor management and orders, plus quick action buttons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin interface for viewing and filtering orders by city and updating order statuses.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page to list, create, edit, and delete products with a dialog-based product form.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Admin vendor management page enabling approval, rejection, outlet status toggling, payments, and document viewing.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, calculates subtotal, handles authentication checks, and navigates to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all product categories with loading skeletons and links to category pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Shows products within a selected category with sorting options and handles empty results.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items, validates identity, creates an order, and clears the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with validation and static contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Displays the logged‑in customer's profile details and role with read‑only fields.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays a customer's order list using fetched data, showing order status, date, item count, and total price with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Shows the user's wishlist by matching stored product IDs with fetched products, rendering product cards with images, pricing, discounts, and availability indicators.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero banners, login buttons, featured deals, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Provides a customer login form with validation for personal details and redirects to the vendor list on successful submission.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Collects and validates vendor outlet details including photo upload, then saves data and redirects to the vendor dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Displays a simple vendor dashboard summarizing registration success and showing stored outlet and personal information.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Lists vendors filtered by city from search params, with cards showing vendor details and navigation to individual shop pages.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: A vendor login form that validates inputs, saves data, and navigates to outlet details on success.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays vendor details by ID with location and contact info, or shows a not-found state.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Displays product details with image carousel, pricing, availability, reviews, and allows adding to cart and submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Shows vendor wallet due, sales, outlet info, and uses queries to load vendor-related data.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Lists vendor orders with status, dates, and details, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Manages vendor products including add, edit, delete, and displays product list with dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides deterministic color classes for categories based on hashed IDs.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Finds a category by case-insensitive name match from a list.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utilities to extract, format, and generate diagnostics text for error messages.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numeric or bigint amounts into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing onboarding-related sessionStorage data for customers, vendors, and outlets.
frontend/src/utils/safeNumbers.ts: Provides safe numeric conversion, formatting, and sanitization utilities to prevent invalid numeric outputs.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order, UI, and stock statuses to corresponding text labels and CSS class names for consistent styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite environment types and exposes optional VITE_II_URL to TypeScript.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, breakpoints, and plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node‑based tooling, enabling ESNext modules and strict settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Configures Vite with React, path aliases, env shims, optimized build outputs, and dev server settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including features, requirements, and current project state info.
